Name: Suppertime Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: STIR preserve and rum in base of shaker to dissolve preserve. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Rhubarb and orange influence this Daiquiri twist.
History: Created in 2008 by Jamie MacDonald at Tigerlily, Edinburgh, England in honour of his good friend Sam Kershaw.
